name: Boxinaboxinabox
description:
BOXINABOXINABOX is a single-player 3D point&click puzzle game with text adventure elements. It is set in a limited game world comprised of boxes, that open into or lead to other box-shaped levels.

The game was developed by Barbara Sedderz, Bener Bozkurt, Cem Ayhan and Zeynep Palaz as a final project for Fundamentals of Game Design in the first semester of the Game Design M.A. The topic of the project phase was "It's not you, it's me". The development began on 28. November 2016 and will end after two weeks of polishing on 30. January 2017.
